message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it's worth $10,000 to you. As an esteemed potential buyer, I am offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that is not only worth more to you but also comes with a significant discount. I trust you will find this offer irresistible. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed.
